name: The Huntsman Path - Sadist Continued
description: Hello there, thanks for dealing with Sanitar. My men examined his belongings, but failed to come up with something useful. I feel that TerraGroup is involved here for sure, and we need to dig more. Just be careful, this man is dangerous.
success_message: Got it? Great. Now we just have to figure out how to find this laboratory.

missions.message: Hand over 1 Sanitar's Bag to Jaeger
